Fist Ernestus was a member of the Flaming Fist mercenary company from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Fist Ernestus was a middle-aged human male with sun-kissed skin and bags under his eyes, obscured by his uniforms helmet. He was adorned in a set of chainmail with a Flaming Fist tabard and carried a heavy halberd.
In the , Fist Ernestus was tasked with patrolling the Lower City of Baldurs gate. During the rising stardom of Duke Enver Gortash and the looming threat of the Absolutist army, Ernestus was faced with some of the Baldurian citizens who were unsatisfied with Gortashs governing and openly criticized the Baldurs Mouth broadsheet that was in the Dukes pocket. Ernestus held Enver Gortash in high opinion, claiming that the Duke had to make "tough decisions" to keep his citizens safe and that if the people had an issue with the Baldurs Mouth Gazettes, they should take it to the rags editor in chief.
